content.prompt: The economic trends shown in the table for the period 1958â€“1975 most directly illustrate which of the following changes in the global economy in the second half of the twentieth century?

choices.label: An increase in Western exports to Asian countries
The shift of manufacturing to East and Southeast Asia
The relative decline of traditional manufacturing because of the rising economic power of China
An increase in state ownership of industrial sectors of the economy

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
